an4.128:0.3: 128. Incredible Things About the Realized One (2nd)
an4.128:1.1: “Mendicants, with the appearance of a Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, four incredible and amazing things appear.
an4.128:1.3: People like attachment, they love it and enjoy it.
an4.128:1.4: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dhamma of non-adherence, they want to listen, they lend an ear, and they apply their minds to understand it.
an4.128:1.5: This is the first incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
an4.128:2.1: People like conceit, they love it and enjoy it.
an4.128:2.2: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dhamma of removing conceit, they want to listen, they lend an ear, and they apply their minds to understand it.
an4.128:2.3: This is the second incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
an4.128:3.1: People like excitement, they love it and enjoy it.
an4.128:3.2: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dhamma of peace, they want to listen, they lend an ear, and they apply their minds to understand it.
an4.128:3.3: This is the third incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
an4.128:4.1: This population is lost in ignorance, trapped in their shells.
an4.128:4.2: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dhamma of removing ignorance, they want to listen, they lend an ear, and they apply their minds to understand it.
an4.128:4.3: This is the fourth incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
an4.128:4.4: With the appearance of a Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, four incredible and amazing things appear.”
